DataElement.preferredName: Patient Prior Systemic Therapy Negation Eligibility Determination Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Eligibility information regarding a person in which prior treatment did not occur.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Patient Prior Systemic Therapy Negation Indicator Eligibility Determination
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary._Earlier in time or order._Treatment using substances that travel through the bloodstream, reaching and affecting cells all over the body._Specifies whether an activity did not occur._Criteria to determine eligibility of patients for medical care programs and services.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A person who requires medical care.

Concepts.definition: A person who receives medical attention, care, or treatment, or who is registered with medical professional or institution with the purpose to receive medical care when necessary.

Property.preferredName: Prior Systemic Therapy Negation Indicator Eligibility Determination
Property.preferredDefinition: Earlier in time or order.:Treatment using substances that travel through the bloodstream, reaching and affecting cells all over the body.:Specifies whether an activity did not occur.:Criteria to determine eligibility of patients for medical care programs and services.

Concepts.definition: Treatment using substances that travel through the bloodstream, reaching and affecting cells all over the body.
Specifies whether an activity did not occur.
The act of determining if a subject is suitable for enrollment in a study according specific protocol criteria and procedures.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: trial-specific criteria that a patient must meet to be enrolled.

DataElementConcept.origin: COG CRF:Children's Oncology Group Case Report Form

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: The preferred Value Domain to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Conceptual domain that includes value meanings to be used for Indicator Value Meanings such as Yes, No, Unknown, No Applicable

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: A caDSR representation term that is used to indicate a question with permissible values of yes/no

Concepts.definition: A response or indicator that can have a value of either yes or no.

ReferenceDocuments.name: Did patient have no prior sys
ReferenceDocuments.description: Did patient have no prior systemic therapy (other than topotecan/cyclophosphamide initiated on an emergent basis and within allowed timing described in protocol section 3.1.5)?

ReferenceDocuments.description: If Yes, Did patient have no prior systemic therapy (other than topotecan/cyclophosphamide initiated on an emergent basis and within allowed timing described in protocol section 3.1.6)?
